nodes.text: Sabodor's was a petshop on Etti IV. Run by the Rakririan Sabodor, it catered to the wealthy upper class of Etti, and was considered the best of the numerous petstores there.

Han Solo and Chewbacca visited Sabodor's to purchase a dinko. At that time it also contained spidery night-gliders of Altarrn, feathered song serpents from the deserts of Proxima Dibal's single planet, and the tiny marsupials from Kimanan, commonly known as furballs.
The store was equipped with an expensive muting system, but even that was not capable of masking all the scents and sounds from the stock.
